entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High zero.
